reviewText: very powerful message for young worshippers. my 5 and 6 year olds have been positively been impacted by it. a very powerful praise and worship tool
I bought this for my Sunday School class and my own kids. It's full of energy and excitment. It's a great day to start out our day as a homeschooling family.
We really enjoy this video, and the grand kids love it.  There's one place where it freezes for a second or two, but that could happen with any DVD video.

I work in the nursery (ages 0-2) at my church and the kids all love this DVD. The music is great, the message is uplifting, and it is a great way to incorporate fun music while teaching the kids about God. I love seeing all of their faces light up when the music starts!

Jesus Is My Superhero - Hillsong Kids - DVD This is such an excellent DVD with inspiring songs for the youth, teenagers, and adults alike. My church uses it weekly in the Kidz Church and I absolutely love the program that is set up with this DVD. It is so great that I ordered the DVD and CD and I can't wait until it arrives. Great for families, and church groups. I hope there will be more to add to my collection 1
This DVD really keeps my children hopping!  They like to do the hand motions, and worship along!
The Hillsong Kids dvd's are tremendous! Great music, hand motions, dance moves and spiritual truth. Highly recommend!!!!
It was what we expected.  Very happy.  It one of the few Christian worship available for kids. My kids like it.

My one year old loves this as much as my 11 year old brother. The upbeat songs and bright colors really catch her attention. In fact, she puts it on everyday by herself. She jumps and dances around the living room while she is singing. It has been a great transition from PraiseBaby into Hillsong's DVD.

I highly recommend it for church and home use.

This DVD was definitely worth the money! It has a mixture of upbeat, dancing songs and also slow worship songs. The lyrics are meaningful and definitely relate to what kids like.
The only downfall is the live worship sessions do not have the lyrics on the screen.
This DVD worked out great for our kids ministry, we worship Sunday mornings using this DVD in kids church. Awesome!!
Great for getting kids moving and excited.  Love this!  My kids love to sing and dance.  They loved this song and dance.
We just finished our VBS for this year. The children loved singing these songs and actually participated by singing and doing motions to the songs. Thanks for great praise & worship music for kids!
This video was amazing. Our summer church camp theme was superheroes and I could not have asked for a better selection of songs.

This is an awesome video!  I love it!  I purchased it for a church, then purchased another for myself.  I have used it in Children's Church and as a music teacher in a Christian school.  The sing-a-long word cartoons are "cheesy" but fun.

The only bad, is the words are not on the screen with the live performance so you can't learn the words and the dance moves at the same time.
My twin grands love this. They have several of the others but not this one. They would recommend it for 3 and up.
This DVD is easy to follow and the kids love having the sing along words on the tv screens!  Energetic!
Love it, great for all ages
Kids love it
Great lyrics! Music is awesome, makes you dance. We use it in our church.
My daughters absolutely love this video.
Great video with worship songs, children's church kids love it
Great love it and came on time
okay
The DVD came to me all scratched. It seems to be good but it skips all over the place,

Neither of my girls (ages 2 and 5) cared for this DVD. They typically love singing/interacting videos, but not this one. I really wanted them to love it since a) it was $25 and b) it's like an hr long.
The songs are VERY catchy! They have a good message to them while also entertaining the kids! There is a lot of different features on the DVD as well!
